item.title: Jenrick defects to Reform UK after being sacked by Tories
item.description: The former minister says the Conservatives "broke Britain", as Nigel Farage welcomes him to his party.

item.title: Iran authorities demanding large sums for return of protesters' bodies, BBC told
item.description: Multiple sources have told BBC Persian that security forces will not release bodies unless relatives hand over money.

item.title: What happens in space during a medical emergency?
item.description: BBC science correspondent Pallab Ghosh explains what happens if an astronaut gets ill in space.

item.title: US forces seize a sixth Venezuela-linked oil tanker in Caribbean Sea
item.description: The tanker, Veronica, was seized in a predawn operation "without incident", the US military's Southern Command says.

item.title: European military personnel arrive in Greenland as Trump says US needs island
item.description: France says a small military contingent has arrived and more forces will be there in the coming days.
